findings.liver: Unremarkable with no significant drop of signal to suggest fatty infiltration.
findings.biliary: No intra- and extra-hepatic biliary ductal dilatation, common duct measuring approximately 5 mm.
findings.hepatic_lesion: Peripheral non enhancing left hepatic lesion with peripheral calcification is stable.
findings.gallbladder: Small layering T1 hypointense filling defects suggestive of small stones; small gallbladder fundal septation noted.
findings.pancreas: Homogeneous enhancement with no surrounding inflammatory changes; normal pancreatic duct.
findings.adrenal_glands: Previously described left adrenal adenoma and thickening of both limbs of the right adrenal gland noted.
findings.renal_lesions: Multiple predominantly T2 hyperintense left renal lesions; largest measuring 8.4 x 9 cm, increased in size from prior examination.
findings.right_kidney: Prominent extrarenal pelvis and mild ureter prominence; enhancing right renal lesions noted, largest increased from 7 x 9 mm to 14 x 18 x 18 mm.
findings.lymphadenopathy: No perihilar, retroperitoneal or mesenteric lymphadenopathy identified.
findings.others: Small amount of perirenal fluid noted bilaterally, greater on the right.
findings.bony_soft_tissue: No concerning bony lesions or soft tissue pathology identified.

changes_over_time.left_renal_lesions: Majority increased in size from previous examinations.
changes_over_time.right_renal_lesions: Largest lesion nearly doubled in size, from 7 x 9 mm to 14 x 18 x 18 mm.
changes_over_time.adrenal_gland: Thickening of both limbs of the right adrenal gland again noted, specific changes not detailed.
